# save_as_csv

    

  

```{r example-save_as_csv}

path <- "mondossier"

mon_dossier_temp <- tempfile(pattern = "saveascsv")
dir.create(mon_dossier_temp)
mypath <- file.path(mon_dossier_temp, "output.csv")

save_as_csv(df = iris, mypath = mypath)
unlink(mypath)
```
